attributes.action: Stop the government from dumping radioactive mud into Cardiff Bay.
attributes.background:
The government approved to have 300,000 tonnes of mud from a disused nuclear plant dumped in Cardiff Bay that could expose people to radioactivity.
Wales has a history of having parts of it's country destroyed by the government and this could be harmful to its people, don't let this happen.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for.  

The Welsh Assembly has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Assembly, you can find out more here:
http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
